name: air_quality_history
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool air_quality.
Tool description: Retrieve current, forecasted, and historical air quality for any point in the world.
API description: Returns the past 24 hours of air quality observations for any point in the world given a lat/lon.

lat.description: Latitude of the location for which to retrieve air quality data.

lon.description: Longitude of the location for which to retrieve air quality data.
